meanings.meaning: 1. present (e.g. government, administration); current; existing
1. reality; consciousness
現 【うつつ】

meanings.type: Noun, Adverb (fukushi), Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. the present; present time; now 現在、通常のサービスの早急な復旧に努めています。We are currently working to restore normal service as soon as possible.
2. as of after a time, date, etc.与党は５時現在で５０議席確保している。The ruling party has secured 50 seats as of 5 o'clock.
3. present tense Grammar
4. this world; this life Buddhism, See also 現世
5. to actually exist; to exist right now; to exist right in front of one
6. Present The present (or now) is the time that is associated with ... Read more
見在 【げんざい】
見在: Rarely-used kanji form.

1. to appear; to come in sight; to become visible; to come out; to embody; to materialize; to materialise ２０人の警官が現場に現れた。Twenty police have arrived on the scene.
2. to be expressed (e.g. emotions); to become apparent (e.g. trends, effects) その薬の効きめが現れた。The medicine took effect.
現われる 【あらわれる】、表れる 【あらわれる】、表われる 【あらわれる】、顕れる 【あらわれる】、顕われる 【あらわれる】
顕われる: Irregular okurigana usage.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. present age; present day; today 私は現代の音楽はあまり好きではない事を認めます。I must admit I don't like much contemporary music.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. modern era; modern times 私達が住んでいる現代に入ってから、私達は国際論争の結末として、２度の世界大戦を体験した。In modern times we have gone through two world wars as the end result of international disputes.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to represent; to signify; to stand for esp. 表す, 表わす＆のマークはａｎｄの文字を表す。The sign "&" stands for "and".

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to reveal; to show; to display esp. 現す, 現わすご自分の栄光を現された。He thus revealed his glory.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to express See also 言い表す, esp. 表す, 表わすあなたのご親切に対し深く感謝の意を表します。I wish to express my deep appreciation for your kindness.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to make widely known esp. 顕す
現す 【あらわす】、表わす 【あらわす】、現わす 【あらわす】、顕す 【あらわす】
